_header: God that all this world hath wrought / And formed all thing
Subjects: Virgin Mary, miracles of; miracles; harlotry
_description: A miracle of Our Lady: Hermit who asked prayers of a Harlot — 168 lines in couplets

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
GOd þat al þis world haþ wrouhtAnd formed alle
                    þing of nouht…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Of hol Remission of vre synneAnd to Ioye þat heo
                    woneþ Inne. Amen.
